objects.name: HISTCONTROL Mitigation
objects.description: Prevent users from changing the HISTCONTROL environment variable (Citation: Securing bash history). Also, make sure that the HISTCONTROL environment variable is set to “ignoredup” instead of “ignoreboth” or “ignorespace”.

external_references.description: Mathew Branwell. (2012, March 21). Securing .bash_history file. Retrieved July 8, 2017.
